name: DelayTheHordeTD - Ludum Dare 50 Entry
description:
A small, probably broken and hardly tested tower defense made for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam. Intentionally hard, possibly laggy :D

Will eventually change name to CosmicGriffin on here to match the jam profile name.

-fixed Tall enemy not able to move upon spawning.

-many more bugs :(
